statements: SELECT * FROM policy_information;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_type, coverage_amount FROM policy_information WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name FROM policy_information WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT policy_holder_name FROM policy_information WHERE policy_type = 'Life';
SELECT * FROM policy_information WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM policy_information WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance' ORDER BY start_date DESC, coverage_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, coverage_amount FROM policy_information WHERE coverage_amount > 500000 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, start_date FROM policy_information WHERE policy_holder_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_type FROM policy_information WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_amount FROM policy_information WHERE coverage_amount < 100000 OR policy_type = 'Health Insurance' ORDER BY policy_holder_name ASC, coverage_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_holder, policy_type FROM PolicyInformation;
SELECT * FROM PolicyInformation WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT underwriter, underwriting_date, underwriting_decision FROM UnderwritingInformation;
SELECT policy_holder, policy_type, policy_start_date FROM PolicyInformation ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM UnderwritingInformation WHERE underwriting_decision = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM PolicyInformation WHERE policy_holder = 'John Doe';
SELECT policy_id, policy_type FROM PolicyInformation ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder, policy_type, policy_start_date FROM PolicyInformation WHERE policy_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM UnderwritingInformation WHERE underwriting_decision LIKE '%approved%';
SELECT policy_holder, underwriter, underwriting_date FROM PolicyInformation JOIN UnderwritingInformation ON PolicyInformation.policy_id = UnderwritingInformation.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM PolicyInformation ORDER BY policy_holder_name DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, policy_type FROM PolicyInformation WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance';
SELECT policy_id, premium_amount FROM PolicyInformation WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Underwriters WHERE underwriter_region = 'Europe' ORDER BY underwriter_experience_years ASC;
SELECT policy_id, document_type, document_url FROM PolicyDocuments WHERE policy_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM PolicyInformation WHERE policy_type = 'Life' AND premium_amount > 1000 ORDER BY effective_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_type, premium_amount FROM PolicyInformation WHERE effective_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT(policy_type) FROM PolicyInformation WHERE premium_amount < 5000;
SELECT p.policy_holder_name, u.underwriter_name, u.underwriter_region FROM PolicyInformation p JOIN Underwriters u ON p.policy_id = u.underwriter_id;
SELECT pd.document_type, pd.document_url, pi.policy_holder_name FROM PolicyDocuments pd JOIN PolicyInformation pi ON pd.policy_id = pi.policy_id WHERE pd.document_type = 'Claim Form';
SELECT * FROM PolicyHolder
SELECT name, age FROM PolicyHolder WHERE age > 30
SELECT policy_id, policy_type FROM Policy ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM PolicyDetails WHERE status = 'Active'
SELECT name, specialty FROM Underwriter
SELECT * FROM PolicyHolder WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, age, address FROM PolicyHolder WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, policy_type, start_date, end_date FROM Policy WHERE premium > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT detail_id, coverage, deductible FROM PolicyDetails WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM Underwriter WHERE specialty IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyDetails;
SELECT policy_number, start_date, premium_amount FROM PolicyDetails ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, end_date FROM PolicyDetails WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_reason FROM PolicyClaims WHERE claim_status = 'approved';
SELECT document_name, document_type, upload_date FROM PolicyDocuments WHERE document_type = 'invoice';
SELECT * FROM PolicyDetails ORDER BY start_date DESC, premium_amount DESC
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, start_date FROM PolicyDetails WHERE premium_amount > 1000 AND start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT pd.policy_number, pd.start_date, pc.claim_amount, pc.claim_reason FROM PolicyDetails pd JOIN PolicyClaims pc ON pd.policy_id = pc.policy_id WHERE pc.claim_status = 'Approved'

SELECT DISTINCT pa.applicant_name, pd.policy_holder_name, pc.claim_amount FROM PolicyApplicants pa JOIN PolicyDetails pd ON pa.policy_id = pd.policy_id JOIN PolicyClaims pc ON pd.policy_id = pc.policy_id WHERE pc.claim_amount > 5000
SELECT ph.modification_type, pd.policy_id, ph.modification_date FROM PolicyHistory ph JOIN PolicyDetails pd ON ph.policy_id = pd.policy_id ORDER BY modification_date ASC
